name: Star Wars: Racer Arcade
overview:
Star Wars Racer Arcade is based on the pod-racing scenes of Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace. Initially the player has a choice of either Anakin Skywalker or Sebulba with the possibility to unlock two further alien race drivers at certain points in the game.

There are four tracks available each with increasing difficulty. Once the racer and track have been chosen, the race which closely mimics events in the movie. A complete race consists of four laps and if a lap is finished within the allotted time, the time is extended.
